snippet: NXP Semiconductors is closing in on a deal to acquire a smaller peer, Freescale Semiconductor, in a cash-and-stock transaction.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. de la MERCED

lead_paragraph: NXP Semiconductors is closing in on a deal to acquire a smaller peer, Freescale Semiconductor, in a cash-and-stock transaction.

headline.main: NXP and Freescale, Two Semiconductor Giants, Said to Be Near a Merger
headline.print_headline: NXP and Freescale, Two Semiconductor Giants, Said to Be Near a Merger
